import React from 'react' import {Unit} from "./UnitSelector/Unit" import {UnitSelector} from "./UnitSelector/UnitSelector" export const Defender = ({unit, setUnit, units}) => { return
{baseShields ? <>
🧊
{defender.base.shields} / {baseShields}
: null}
{defender? defender.base.armor + armorResearch*defender.research.armor: null} 🛡
{defender? <>= {defender.base.armor} + {armorResearch}: null}
♥️
{defender? <>{defender.base.health} / {baseHealth} : null}
 }
